## Service 1: Enterprise Architecture Consultancy

**title:** Enterprise Architecture Consultancy

**slug:** enterprise-architecture-consultancy (auto-generated)

**description:** Strategic technology planning and architecture design to align IT infrastructure with business objectives and drive digital transformation.

**icon:** üèõÔ∏è

**detailedDescription:** (Rich text - you can format this in Strapi)
Our Enterprise Architecture Consultancy service helps organizations design and implement robust, scalable technology frameworks that support long-term business goals. We work closely with C-level executives and IT leaders to create comprehensive architecture roadmaps, evaluate technology options, and ensure seamless integration across all systems. Our approach combines industry best practices with deep technical expertise to deliver solutions that drive innovation while managing risk and complexity.

**features:** (JSON format)
```json
[
  "Technology roadmap development",
  "Architecture assessment and gap analysis",
  "Cloud strategy and migration planning",
  "Integration architecture design",
  "Technology vendor evaluation",
  "Governance framework establishment"
]
```

**benefits:** (JSON format)
```json
[
  "Aligned IT strategy with business objectives",
  "Reduced technology complexity and costs",
  "Improved scalability and flexibility",
  "Faster time-to-market for new initiatives",
  "Better risk management and compliance",
  "Enhanced decision-making capabilities"
]
```

We leverage modern development frameworks, DevOps practices, and cloud-native architectures to build scalable, secure applications. Our experienced development teams work in sprints, providing regular demos and incorporating feedback to ensure the final product meets your exact requirements.

We follow ITIL best practices and provide transparent reporting on all service metrics.

## How to Add to Strapi

1. Go to http://localhost:1337/admin
2. Click "Content Manager" ‚Üí "Service"
3. Click "Create new entry"
4. Copy and paste each field from above
5. The slug will auto-generate from the title
6. For JSON fields (features, benefits), copy the JSON exactly as shown
7. Click "Save"
8. Click "Publish"
9. Repeat for all 8 services
